title: Essence
body: When i logged in a while ago i went to loot and it said your total is 13,733 but i only had 5k and now i relogged cuz i read that it might  take a bit and now i have 6k and people said stuff about orbs in loot but i dont have any orbs.....help

replies.body: It looks like you were able to collect your BE.  To clarify, though, you need to complete a mission and then collect the capsules in your hextech inventory.

I didn't get my 70,000 BE after It said it gave it to me when I completed the mission. It says it gave it but my balance remains the same.

there are a bunch of other people posting about it happening the them to.
ahh, I didn't realize you had to go into loot and open the capsules. Nothing in the game really tells you to do that. It just shows your new balance, probably what is confusing everyone.
